description: You'll need to cross a field of hot lava without overheating if you want to reach your next destination, Mount Ashburn!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn on blue lights then automatically move forward 20 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: This volcanic landscape looks pretty rough. And hot!

hints.description: Set the Move state to 20 cm/s in the forward direction. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After Dash starts moving, make Dash change the light color every 3.0 s. Make Dash change the lights to green then yellow then magenta then red.
puzzles.introduction: Looks like Dash is starting to heat up while crossing the lava!

hints.description: Link the states with Wait For cues set to 3.0 s.

puzzles.description: After Dash turns on red lights, make Dash automatically say "Oh no!" then instantly start spinning fast with the left wheel going 80cm/s and the right wheel going -80cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: Uh oh!  Dash is really heating up. This looks like trouble!

hints.description: Link the sound with an Auto cue. Link the Moving Basics state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: Link the Listener state to the Stop state using the Picked Up cue.

hints.description: Link the Listener to Stop using a Picked Up cue.

puzzles.description: After Dash stops, make Dash automatically say "That's cool!" and then instantly turn on blue lights.
puzzles.introduction: Looks like Dash is cooling down.

hints.description: Use an Instant cue to link the "That's Cool!" sound to the Blue light so that Dash will turn blue while speaking.

puzzles.description: After Dash turns on blue lights, make Dash move again when Dash is put down.

hints.description: Link the Blue light back to the Move state using a Put Down cue.
